content.query:
SELECT
YEAR(CreationDate) AS [year]
,COUNT(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseplaygroundeu.dfs.core.windows.net/lake/StackOverflow/Full/dbo.Posts.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY YEAR(CreationDate)

SELECT
     [result].filepath(1) AS [year]
    ,COUNT(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseplaygroundeu.dfs.core.windows.net/lake/StackOverflow/PartitionedByYear/Posts/year=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY [result].filepath(1)


SELECT
     [result].filepath(1) AS [year]
    ,COUNT(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseplaygroundeu.dfs.core.windows.net/lake/StackOverflow/PartitionedByYearMonth/Posts/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY [result].filepath(1)

SELECT
     [result].filepath(1) AS [year]
    ,COUNT(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseplaygroundeu.dfs.core.windows.net/lake/StackOverflow/PartitionedByYearMonthDay/Posts/year=*/month=*/day=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY [result].filepath(1)

SELECT
    [result].filepath(1) AS [year]
    ,COUNT(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseplaygroundeu.dfs.core.windows.net/lake/StackOverflow/PartitionedByYearMonthDayHour/Posts/year=*/month=*/day=*/hour=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY [result].filepath(1)

SELECT
    [result].filepath(1) AS [year]
    ,COUNT(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseplaygroundeu.dfs.core.windows.net/lake/StackOverflow/PartitionedByYearMonthDayHourMinute/Posts/year=*/month=*/day=*/hour=*/minute=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY [result].filepath(1)
